name: wiwi
description:
current world record: 17,5s

based of Unity's platformer template, tried to give the game more 'juice' without changing the inherent mechanics too much!

To the person grading this:

  • Buttons scale up and down on hover
  • Buttons make sound upon hovering over them
  • Clicking buttons creates particles and plays a sound
  • Sound settings are now also in the main menu
  • A little cog symbol can be clicked to open the menu (escape also works)
  • The title screen has a cursor trail which affects the particles 
  • Moving the mouse in the title screen slightly moves the text 
  • Moving the mouse in the pause menu
  • Menu now slides in and out (pausing immediately when sliding in, unpausing when the slide-out finishes)
